item.title: Trump Is Right About Letting Palestinian Refugees Leave Gaza
item.description: Keeping descendants of 1948 refugees in the Gaza Strip perpetuates a futile war against Israel. They should be allowed to flee Hamas’ rule.

item.title: Dear Management, Are You Racist For Ditching DEI?
item.description: How are federal workers to interpret their bosses' capricious ditching of DEI, which based on former guidance would be a gross violation of human righ...

item.title: Trump’s Executive Order Still Allows Foreigners To Buy U.S. Citizenship Via Surrogacy
item.description: Unless the order’s interpretation of the 14th Amendment addresses all forms of birth tourism, foreign nationals will continue to exploit U.S. citizens...

item.title: Trump’s Educational Freedom Order Extends School Choice Week For Four More Years
item.description: School choice proponents around the country have much to celebrate, but powerful entrenched interests have organized staunch opposition too.

item.title: The Woke Fever Broke, So Why Is Bezos Still Banning Ryan Anderson’s Book On Transgenderism?
item.description: When Harry Became Sally is still banned on Amazon, even as the vibes have shifted and Trump successfully campaigned against gender ideology.
